Title: Project A-Ko 2: Plot of the Daitokuji Financial Group

Plot: It's summer in Graviton City, and the girls all have a break from school! A-Ko decides to lose a few inches, C-Ko makes a list of all the cool things that she'll buy, and B-Ko vows to get ...
